alert.note: Alert for Martin; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 12:20PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Washington, northwestern Hyde, southeastern Martin, northeastern Beaufort and western Tyrrell Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1220 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Terra Ceia, or 15 miles northeast of River Road, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Belhaven, Ponzer, Pinetown, Pungo, Wenona, Hinson, Pike Road, Leechville, Winsteadville, Sidney Crossroads, Westover, Pleasant Grove, Terra Ceia, Scuppernong, Yeatesville, Phelps Lake, Pungo Lake, Mackeys and Roper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
